title: Celebrity Detector
description: Preprocessor to detect celebrities in an image. The associated information can be found in preprocessor named 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.celebrityDetector'.

celebrities.description: Contains a list of celebrities detected by the preprocessor 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.celebrityDetector'

personID.description: The ID of a person. The ID is generated by object detection preprocessor and is reused in this preprocessor

confidence.description: The confidence value of the output
